### Checklist

- [ ] All modified/added `.md` files include the hidden YAML‑in‑HTML header (see `docs/WRITING-STANDARDS.md`).
- [ ] `title/description/date/license/version` set correctly in headers.
- [ ] License SPDX matches project policy (LSL-1.0 for core).
- [ ] Tests run clean locally (`zig build test`).
- [ ] Docs updated where applicable.

### Summary

Describe the change, rationale, and any performance/UX impact.
